opening_theme: #1: "Save you Save me" by Kanami Etou (Kaede Hondo), Hiyori Juujuu (Saori Oonishi), Mai Yanase (Azumi Waki), Sayaka Itomi (Hina Kino), Kaoru Mashiko (Risae Matsuda), Eren Kohagura (Eri Suzuki) (eps 1-12)
